tags: it is not important at all
as a french literature major I just wanted to find out what the books were
summary: I don’t know if Mika and Manon are buying books for Lucas but they are buying a couple of lgbt+ french books so it might be...
body:
I don’t know if Mika and Manon are buying books for Lucas but they are buying a couple of lgbt+ french books so it might be linked to tomorrow’s pride talk.

I did not manage to identify all the books but the first three are definitely lgbt+ books. There are :

- Copi, Théâtre 

- Jean-Luc Lagarce, Journal (Diary)

- Hervé Guilbert, La mausolée des amants. Journal 1976-1991 (Diary)

The last book Mika takes is not a lgbt+ book (but it is a book by a brilliant author). It is Wadji Mouawad’s Anima.

summary: (this is about skamfr) IM- I CANT IM SO SAD ANICA :(( ik that once we get past the angst everything will be fine but im- that...
question: (this is about skamfr) IM- I CANT IM SO SAD ANICA :(( ik that once we get past the angst everything will be fine but im- that clip really broke my heart I just wanna hold Elliot :(( also i know that the angst went down almost the same way with evak and we’ve been trough that but !!! it really really feels to me like a completely different story, this two 😪 I thought I wouldn’t feel what i felt with any remake what i felt for evak,, it’s like I don’t see them like “French Evak” it’s just Elu
answer:
I feel this, pumpkin. Literally me before starting this season: You know what will happen. You know the pain will come sooner rather than later. Don’t be surprised when it did. You’ve gone through this twice.

Today’s clip: *happened*

me: lmao Nevermind.

I think what broke me was that Lucas was super wary and kinda scared in kissing Eliott at first because he didn’t know what to expect but then Eliott told him that he is on board and Lucas was immediately “here I am lemme kiss you in public”. They were so happy for a second and then my heart broke.

Like with Even and Nico you could see how they put up a brave face, too, when they heard about the “crazy people” stuff but they still acted like everything is kinda fine and kissed them goodbye and went with them. Whereas Eliott really was just angry and backed off and… that killed me. 

Can we please switch to the end of episode 7 now? Not that the pain that follows is any better. Haha 

me @ me: Why am I doing this to myself for a third time?

summary: Seriously, Skam France never cease to amaze me. So far, Elliott is one of the characters that represents in a very real way what...
body:
Seriously, Skam France never cease to amaze me. So far, Elliott is one of the characters that represents in a very real way what Mental Illness means and how hard is to live with one. It’s heartbreaking because it’s real. I know, for my own experience with borderline, that hearing a person that you love, saying despective things about mentally ill people [maybe not knowing that you are one], is awfull. You can feel the shame and the pain, because you are struggling with something that you didn’t choose to deal with. And a mental illness doesn’t define you. You are more than bipolarity, more than borderline, more than anxiety, more than any illness you could have, MUCH MORE.

David, Niels, Axel Maxence and all the crew are killing it. I thing i own them my first born.

But Elliott may not know it.

And Lucas doesn’t realize how much he’s hurting his mec with that words. And it’s not his fault either.

He doesn’t know how to deal with mentally ill people, he never learned. Like, it was so hard for him to deal with his mother that he chooses leave the house and go to leave with new people, and his father even support him.

He’s craving for a family, he’s craving for not just a place to sleep, but a home.

They’re both hurt in they’re own ways.

But we know that at the end they’re gonna heal each other as well.

summary: Okay but last Wednesday Lucas was in full gay panic mode: pretending he was all over Chloe and saying she was his girlfriend...
body:
Okay but last Wednesday Lucas was in full gay panic mode: pretending he was all over Chloe and saying she was his girlfriend when Manon asked him about Eliott.

This Wednesday it took him about 30 seconds to get used to kissing Eliott in the hallways of school.

We stan character development and brave hedgehogs.

blog.name: loveforpiccolinoandbambi
blog.title: NicotinoAddict
blog.description: Somewhere over the rainbow

summary: Can we please respect hashtags.
body:
Can we please respect hashtags.

Entering a given hashtag, I want to see things related to it.

I will give you an example

From some time, I have notoriously seen in #skamitalia more skam france than skamit gifs posts etc ( I’m not talking about these mixed posts, I’m talking about those that literally has nothing to do with skamit) and I don’t think this is alright. If a post about skam France, druck or any other parallel universe has nothing to do with Skam italia, then why add such a tags?

And vice versa! of course! If skamit has nothing to do with other skam remakes don’t put their titles in hashtags if your post is about SKAM italia only

Simple as that

FORGIVE ME MY ENGLISH

And remember, this is not hate post, I love all skam remakes, but it’s annoying to go in tags and seeing everything except what you’re looking for

reblog.comment:
Can we please respect hashtags.

Entering a given hashtag, I want to see things related to it.

I will give you an example

From some time, I have notoriously seen in #skamitalia more skam france than skamit gifs posts etc ( I’m not talking about these mixed posts, I’m talking about those that literally has nothing to do with skamit) and I don’t think this is alright. If a post about skam France, druck or any other parallel universe has nothing to do with Skam italia, then why add such a tags?

And vice versa! of course! If skamit has nothing to do with other skam remakes don’t put their titles in hashtags if your post is about SKAM italia only

Simple as that

FORGIVE ME MY ENGLISH

And remember, this is not hate post, I love all skam remakes, but it’s annoying to go in tags and seeing everything except what you’re looking for
